content: this will be your corner 1dc in next 15 stitches repeat this pattern corner+dcs all the way around joining at the end 76 stitches 19 on each side of the square row 7- pick up white yarn chain 3 1dc in the next 10 stitches in the next stitch 2tc+ch2+2tc this will be your corner 1dc in the next 19 stitches repeat this pattern corner+dcs all the way around joining at the end 92 stitches 23 on each side you are officially done with your first square you can join each square however you choose i used invisible seam and then create whatever border you d like i ended up deciding to double_crochet around the whole border with a row of white doing a 2tc+ch2+2tc in each corner and then doing a row of green and a row of pink in single_crochet doing 1sc+ch2+1sc in each corner happy crocheting trainers if you make this pattern i would absolutely love to see it please tag me on instagram and reddit @leveluplexie or u/leveluplexie so i can see how it turned out any pattern feedback you have is much appreciated -picture on the following page-
